mapper.update: update blog set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `language` = #{language,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nice = #{nice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scan = #{scan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where blog_id = #{blogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select blog_id, title, `language`, user_id, post_time, `status`, nice, scan, content from blog
